pages.text: A $(item)Wither Rose$() is a unique flower with negative properties. $(br2)Any $(l:creatures/human-player)$(thing)Player$() or mob that touches it will be granted the $(l:brewing/effects#wither)$(thing)Wither effect$(). $(br2)They can only be obtained when the $(l:creatures/boss-wither)$(thing)Wither$() kills another mob.
